revision.text:
{{codepointer|Status change}}'''A_ActiveAndUnblock'''
(no parameters)
Plays the active sound and then calls [[A_NoBlocking]].
== Examples ==
The following two [[DECORATE]] code blocks are equivalent.
Death: MONS HI 5 MONS J 0 [[A_ActiveSound]] MONS J 5 [[A_NoBlocking]] MONS K -1 stop
Death: MONS HI 5 MONS J 5 [[A_ActiveAndUnblock]] MONS K -1 stop
